gameJournal.title: Game Journal
points: Built a fullstack PWA, installable on iOS/Android.
Implemented user authentication and data persistence with MongoDB.
Implemented data validation with Zod and schema-based access control, ensuring robust security and user permissions.
Designed a responsive UI with CSS Modules and React Router.

mernTaskManager.title: MERN Task Manager
points: Built a fullstack MERN application for task management.
Designed REST API with Express and Mongoose with CRUD operations.
Implemented user authentication with JWT and secured routes.
Optimized frontend with responsive design and CSS Modules for a seamless user experience.
